name: Weltromlofer
description:
Story
You are a talented young soldier assigned to investigate a mysterious planet that has just been discovered, along with a partner who is an experienced veteran, but the planet is far more dangerous than you predicted and you were stranded there, however you have to survive and looking for a way out of that damned planet!!🚀

Game features
🔥Fast and tight gameplay
🔥Various alien
🔥Various power ups
🔥Huge boss with different states
🔥Gather crystal & spend it in the shop 🔥Customizable buttons

Future plans
🎨Player skins! 🤠Different playable characters
🌎Different types of biome
🤖More enemy types
👹More boss
💪More power ups

Note:
This game is still in an early stage and is under development, There will be many changes to the visual and gameplay that will make it different. For that we hope you can understand if there are many shortcomings and errors in this game, and Thank you for those of you who have deigned to play this game.
If you have criticism and suggestions you can contact us, we will be very happy to hear it, and we will appreciate all forms of help and support!
